mapper.select: select case when member_sex=1 then '남자' else '여자' end as MEMBER_SEX, HUMANNUM from ( SELECT MEMBER_SEX , COUNT(MEMBER_SEX) AS HUMANNUM FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_LEVEL = 2 GROUP BY MEMBER_SEX)

select case when member_country='ko' then '한국' when member_country='jp' then '일본' else '중국' end as country, humannum from ( select member_country, count(member_country) as humannum from member where member_level=2 group by member_country)
